column4: hi people, i just installed 9.10, and its been a while since i was on ubuntu, is there a way to get the volume control out of the notification area and just get the solo applet, i've installed the pulseaudio vol. control applet but it doesnt show in the list when i try to add an applet to the panel and i dont know how to get this one out of the notification area
jayx: youll need to comment out the memtes options in /boot/grub/menu.lst
